abstract: New York Yankess reassign 17 players to minor league camp.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees reassigned 17 players to their minor league camp, including outfielder Aaron Judge, reliever Jacob Lindgren and pitcher James Kaprielian.

headline.main: Yankees Assign Aaron Judge and James Kaprielian to Minors

snippet: The Yankees reassigned 17 players to their minor league camp, including outfielder Aaron Judge, reliever Jacob Lindgren and pitcher James Kaprielian.
